name: Ipp Simple Loading
author: johnguaz

sections.description:
Add loading screens to your beautiful WordPress websites

FEATURES & OPTIONS

  • Different Loader types in css3 animation where you can customize the size and color
  • Customizable background colors
  • Option to add your logo in the loading screen
  • Option to add text and exit button for your loading screen
  • Option to choose which published pages and public post types to show the loading screen
  • Option to add entrance and exit animation for your loading screen
sections.faq:
Changes not reflecting

Make sure you have saved the setting and if you have installed any caching plugins then kindly clear the cache.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial Released

1.0.1

  • Use rest_route instead of wp-json to handle none pretty permalink setup

1.0.2

  • prevent body scroll while loading page
  • improve exit button icon

2.0.0

  • make prevent body scroll while loading page configurable
  • Add optional background effect warpspeed
  • Add optional background effect squares
  • Add optional background effect waves
  • Add optional background effect grid
  • Add optional background effect ripple
  • Add optional background effect diagonal

2.1.0

  • Add new property and option to change background effect colors

2.2.0

  • Add background image configuration

2.2.1

  • bugfix on none logo animation
